p: Danila et al. [ 112] aimed at assessing the phenolic content of L. album and L. maculatum methanolic extracts, and their antioxidant capacity: for the DPPH assay the EC 50 (µg/mL) values were 32.3 ± 0.1 for L. maculatum extract and 63.5 ± 0.7 for L. album extract, while in the ABTS assay EC50 (µg/mL) values were 13.2 ± 0.1 for L. maculatum extract and 19.9 ± 0.5 for L. album extract.
